title: Sonne
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eins, zwei, drei, vier, fünf, sechs, sieben, acht, neun, aus
lines.translation: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, out
lines.grammar: aus → dative (out of); Meaning: 'One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, out'; Remember V2 word order; separable prefixes often sit at the end; cases follow the given prepositions.

lines.text: Alle warten auf das Licht
lines.translation: Everyone is waiting for the light
lines.grammar: warten (infinitive/plural); auf → acc (onto) / dat (on); Meaning: 'Everyone is waiting for the light'; Remember V2 word order; separable prefixes often sit at the end; cases follow the given prepositions.

lines.text: Fürchtet euch, fürchtet euch nicht
lines.translation: Fear not, fear not
lines.grammar: fürchtet (3sg/2pl present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'Fear not, fear not'; Remember V2 word order; separable prefixes often sit at the end; cases follow the given prepositions.

lines.text: Die Sonne scheint mir aus den Augen
lines.translation: The sun is shining out of my eyes
lines.grammar: scheint (3sg/2pl present), den (infinitive/plural); aus → dative (out of); Meaning: 'The sun is shining out of my eyes'; Remember V2 word order; separable prefixes often sit at the end; cases follow the given prepositions.

lines.text: Sie wird heut Nacht nicht untergeh'n
lines.translation: She will not go down tonight
lines.grammar: heut (3sg/2pl present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'She will not go down tonight'; Remember V2 word order; separable prefixes often sit at the end; cases follow the given prepositions.
